post.description: Returns a paginated list of admins with search and sorting capabilities. Includes no, name, username, role, email, supplier_id, and created_at.

requestBody.description: Optional parameters for filtering and pagination

search.description: Global search across name, email, and username

sortColumn.description: Column to sort by (namaLengkap, username, email, role, created_at, id)

role.description: Filter by role (slug or name, case-insensitive)

post.description: Create a new user (admin or regular user) based on role. SUPER_ADMIN and ADMIN_PEMASOK will be created in system_users table. Other roles will be created in users table.

role.description: Role to assign to the user

post.description: Update user information (admin or regular user) by ID
Logs in a user and returns an access token

Revokes the existing token and generates a new token for the authenticated user.

post.description: Change user password after email verification.

requestBody.description: Request body containing the verification token and new password

token.description: Verification token received in the email

Send password reset link.

Koperasi rejects supplier's price/quantity confirmation

Record stock movements (IN, OUT, ADJUSTMENT, OPNAME) with FEFO allocation for OUT movements

Mark a stock alert as resolved

AdminCreateRequest.title: User Create Request
AdminCreateRequest.description: Request schema for creating a new user (admin or regular user)

role.description: Role to assign to the user

supplier_data.description: Supplier data (REQUIRED for PEMASOK/ADMIN_PEMASOK roles if supplier_id not provided. Can send either full supplier_code OR separate components)

district.description: District/Kota (REQUIRED, will be saved to database: Karawang, Jakarta Selatan, etc)

supplier_type.description: Supplier type (REQUIRED): RAW=bahan baku, PKG=packaging, EQP=equipment, CON=consumable

supplier_code.description: Full supplier code (OPTIONAL if using separate fields. Format: SUP-{TIPE}-{PERUSAHAAN}-{LOKASI}-{TAHUN}-{URUT})

supplier_company_code.description: Company code (3 uppercase letters, for separate field input)

supplier_location.description: Location code (3 uppercase letters, for separate field input)

supplier_year.description: Year (2 digits, for separate field input)

supplier_sequence.description: Sequence number (4 digits, for separate field input)

dapur_data.description: Dapur data (optional - if not provided and dapur_id not provided, will auto-create with minimal data)

AdminUpdateRequest.title: User Update Request
AdminUpdateRequest.description: Request schema for updating a user (admin or regular user)

role.description: Role to assign to the user

supplier_id.description: Supplier ID (optional - if not provided, will create new supplier)

dapur_id.description: Dapur ID (optional - if not provided, will create new dapur)

supplier_data.description: Supplier data (required for PEMASOK/ADMIN_PEMASOK role if supplier_id not provided)

dapur_data.description: Dapur data (required for DAPUR role if dapur_id not provided)

id.description: The unique identifier for the activity log.

action.description: The action performed by the admin (e.g., 'approved_contract').

model_type.description: The type of the model being acted upon (e.g., 'contract').

model_id.description: The ID of the model being acted upon (e.g., the contract ID).

meta.description: Additional metadata related to the action (e.g., contract name, user ID).

created_at.description: The timestamp when the activity log was created.
